title: WTT for T-206 Mathewson, Young, or Lajoie
author: Louisville_Hugger

posts.post_title: WTT for T-206 Mathewson, Young, or Lajoie
posts.post_content:
I know this is a long shot here, but I’m looking to trade my ungraded 2011 Bowman Chrome draft Mike Trout refractor rookie for a lower grade (doesn’t have to actually be graded) T-206 Mathewson, Young or Nap. Hoping one of you collects all eras like I do and we can swing a trade that we’re both happy with. Accidentally posted same thread in the other BST Tobacco card sun (not t-206), so if someone could kindly delete I would appreciate it. If anyone is interested I will PM pics......the Trout is near perfect although I’m sure it wouldn’t Gem if you sent it in. Visually with the naked eye, I cannot find any faults. 

JP
